This bitter paste is used among some gladiatorial rings for its short-term benefits in a fight.

**Saving Throw** DC 20 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 1 hour; **Stage 1** +2 item bonus to Perception rolls for initiative, and if you have an addiction to zerk, your melee weapon and unarmed attacks deal an extra 2 damage during the first round of a combat encounter (1 minute); **Stage 2** [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 hour)
